column4: i cant connect to any IRC network on my Ubuntu machine, what could be going on?
yes.. i get connection refused when i try to connect to one
do you ahve a firewall that could be not allowing it to run?
i have a firewall, but i thought i disabled it
i'm guessing that software router is causing your issue.
i know nothing about linux s/w firewalls, but i'm guesing thats where your issue is gonna be
